welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Yarmouth! Known for its beautiful beaches and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beloved city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barnstable Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Martha's Vineyard Airport handles all commercial flights and has various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nantucket Memorial Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Nantucket Memorial Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
